EmailTemplate.description: New Complaint Management Case Email Message Notification To Assignee
EmailTemplate.name: New Complaint Management Case Email Message Notification To Assignee
EmailTemplate.subject: A new case email message.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
New Support Case
California Environmental Protection Agency Environmental Complaint System
New Email Message
A new email message has been received for Case Number: {!Case.CaseNumber}. Click here to view the case. Thank You, CalEPA Complaint Help Desk
